Sanskriti MUN 2018

25th — 27th April

Welcome, Delegates

It is our immense pleasure to invite you to the 7th edition of Sanskriti Model United Nations Conference to be held in Sanskriti School, New Delhi, India, 25th — 27th April 2017.

Aimed at creating intellecutually stimulating debate and dialogue, Sanskriti MUN hopes to create globally aware, diplomatic, free-thinking leaders, and better human beings.
